title: Silk Sync Configuration
description: Configuration for the silk-sync workflow that standardizes repository labels and settings across the organization.

$schema.description: Path to the JSON schema file.

labels.description: GitHub issue labels to sync across repositories.

name.description: The label name. Case-insensitive matching is used during sync.

description.description: A short description of the label's purpose.

color.description: The hex color code for the label (without # prefix).

settings.description: Repository settings applied via the GitHub REST API (repos.update).

allow_merge_commit.description: Allow merge commits on pull requests.

allow_squash_merge.description: Allow squash merging on pull requests.

squash_merge_commit_title.description: Default title for squash merge commits.

squash_merge_commit_message.description: Default message for squash merge commits.

allow_rebase_merge.description: Allow rebase merging on pull requests.

allow_update_branch.description: Allow updating pull request branches from the base branch.

delete_branch_on_merge.description: Automatically delete head branches after pull requests are merged.
